```{r}
# Wrangling
library(plyr)

# Stats
library(lme4)
library(boot)
library(brms)

# Plotting
library(ggplot2)
library(ghibli)

# Standard error function
std.error <- function(x, na.rm = T) {
  sqrt(var(x, na.rm = na.rm)/length(x[complete.cases(x)]))
}
```
